name: tiny-lru
description: Tiny LRU cache for Client or Server
author: Jason Mulligan <jason.mulligan@avoidwork.com>

scripts.build: npm run lint && rm -rf dist/* && npm run rollup && npm run mocha
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.test-webpack: rm -rf test/webpack && git clone git@github.com:rabelais88/typescript-webpack.git test/webpack && echo "import { lru } from 'tiny-lru';console.log(lru(1));" >> test/webpack/src/index.ts && cd test/webpack && npm install && mkdir -p node_modules/tiny-lru/dist && cp ../../package.json node_modules/tiny-lru/ && cp ../../dist/* node_modules/tiny-lru/dist/ && npm run build
